name: Listened to Dear Internet Episode 12 – Mold, Smart Homes, and Scary Clowns

content.html:
Dear Internet, This week’s show is wild. What do you do when your girlfriend is taken over by mold? Is a cool house that everyone would love worth losing your wife over? And what do you do when your kids are scared of your hobbies? Also, be sure to stay after the music for a special interview. We are a new show, and would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Cast of Thrones. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick Bristow, Jennifer Cheek, Michael DiMauro, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
